DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , single arm , Phase Ib dose escalation study Oxcarbazepine morphine patient refractory cancer pain . The primary endpoint evaluate safety toxicity combination Oxcarbazepine plus morphine . The secondary endpoint improve pain control , reduce morphine use improve quality life .
